title: The BOX
description: This is the story of a fictional popular science fiction writer named Cara Van Dyck, who is given a box of highly classified government documents. These documents tell what the government knows about the "True History" of Humankind on the Earth and what it also knows about Extraterrestrials visiting the planet. Cara comes in contact with a variety of individuals and circumstances as she explores what she has been given and what is is she is requested to do with it. A Paranormal, Sci-Fi, Sexy Adventure into what the government might really know and have!
author: Roger McKasson
